title: I play this game fine for one day, Now two days later the game crashes on start up.
body:
I dont know whats going on, Uninstalling and reinstalling didnt help.

(https://i.gyazo.com/bc44ae86ad631ac9e6a3ffa17b40145a.png)

replies.body: Unfortunately, that screenshot doesn't lead to anything for me.  What do you mean by crashing at start up?  What exactly is starting up and what does the error say?  I'd like to help with some more info!
PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working. Thats the error message i'm getting.

That's perfect, thanks!  This error is commonly a result of pc settings that's denying the patcher permissions to launch or scan files.  Go through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access.  That should get you in game.

Can you please help, every time i try to launch the game i get this error

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\api-ms-crt-multibyte-|1-1-0.dll

Then below it says that it isn't designed to run on Windows (i am using Windows 7 btw.) and that i should re-install the client.

I did re-install the client it didn't work, then i used the repair thingy when you click the questione mark (?).
I don't know what to do please help, without help League will have 1 less support main.
same i cant login too 2 days now
